price: 53਼ ਕੀ ਉਹ ਇਕ ਦੂਜੇ ਨੂੰ ਇਹੋ ਗੱਲ ਦੱਸਦੇ ਆਏ ਹਨ ? ਨਹੀਂ ਸਗੋਂ ਉਹ ਤਾਂ ਸਾਰੇ ਬਾਗ਼ੀ ਹਨ।
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
